citations.narrative:
Approximately 1/3 of the dirt substrate in the indoor enclosure housing 2 adult domestic chickens is saturated with liquid
creating mud. A facility representative indicated that a full water bowl had accidently been overturned earlier. The only
water receptacle available to the chickens is attached to the side of the hutch where the animals must walk over the
saturated substrate to access drinking water. Housing facilities must be constructed so that animal wastes and water,
except for water in pools or other aquatic areas, must be rapidly eliminated so the animals have the option of remaining
dry. Corrected at time of inspection.
Correct from this date forward of 29 November 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.150(g) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Approximately 1/3 of the dirt substrate in the indoor enclosure housing 2 adult domestic chickens is saturated with liquid 
creating mud. A facility representative indicated that a full water bowl had accidently been overturned earlier. The only 
water receptacle available to the chickens is attached to the side of the hutch where the animals must walk over the 
saturated substrate to access drinking water. Housing facilities must be constructed so that animal wastes and water, 
except for water in pools or other aquatic areas, must be rapidly eliminated so the animals have the option of remaining 
dry. Corrected at time of inspection.  
 
Correct from this date forward of 29 November 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
